page.title: 03Employment
page.content: In our survey we found the most common type of employment was factory work(out of the area),cleaning,driving and working on the ship yards.The varied list of employment also contained salesmen,civil servants,shop assistants,brewery workers,mechanics and builders. Of the people surveyed we found the incidence of 'working mothers' to be quiet low.Those who did work were employed as night-time bar staff or worked in the local schools as 'nannies' or kitchen staff. Unemployment is quite a problem within the area,particularly for the young.The unemployment rate is currently standing at between 17% and 19%.Youth training schemes are hard tofind.
